Pre-Game Insights: Gregor Kobel has replaced Yann Sommer as Switzerland's number 1 goalkeeper.
Kobel expressed his excitement about playing in the national team, stating it was his dream since childhood.
Yakin mentioned that the team has various options for central defense and expects a tough duel against Denmark.
The question of who will take penalties after Shaqiri's retirement was raised, with the captain deciding during the game.
Kobel is new to the national team council and aims to create a good atmosphere and perform well.
Yakin emphasized the importance of the Nations League for World Cup qualifiers and expressed delight for Kobel's new role.
Yakin stated that the team will play a system with two central midfielders against Denmark.
